title: ‘You Never Want to Regret Not Doing Something’: Cavendish Reveals Motivation to Chase Tour de France Record
content:
'It shows anything is possible': Cavendish digs into what pushed him on against naysayers, age, injuries, and rivals.

Read the full article at ‘You Never Want to Regret Not Doing Something’: Cavendish Reveals Motivation to Chase Tour de France Record on Velo.
author: ahood
